_header: Roll up thy reason and grave it in thy mind
_description: Advice to live well and to be prepared for death — one rhyme royal stanza

PULTayM5.Transcription:
Rolle vp thye reson and graue yt in þi mynderemembyr yt well for
                    yt ys a trewthfrom erth þu camyst & thyther most þu
                    wyndefforsake yll costomys broght vp of youthesclepe nat to long yt
                    were grete rewythþu schalte be callyd when þu hast leste
                    thoghtafter thy deserte thy plase schalbe wroght
PULTayM5.Note: Added to blank page at end of volume.
PULTayM5.Attributed Author: quod William ffayre com voo plera (f. 194v)
